jd: From: Hari Prasad, Smartfolks prasad@smartfolksinc.com Reply to: prasad@smartfolksinc.com Hi, Greetings from Smart Folks Inc!My name is Hari Prasad we have a job opportunity for Portfolio Manager Telecom Domainfor one of our clients. Please find the Job description below, if you are available and interested, please send us your word copy of your resume with following detail to Prasad@smartfolksinc.com. Role: Portfolio Manager Telecom DomainLocation: Denver, CO – Onsite (NEED LOCALS)Duration: 6-12 MonthsMinimum Work Experience- 10+ Years Job Details:Responsible for Cable Wireline architecture road mappingWill be working business product owners and develop project intake and delivery timelineWill Interface with IT and other Delivery Partners and stakeholders and determine optimal solutions and delivery timelinesWill be required to establish cross functional collaborations and build relationshipWill be required to work with design and development teams and ensure quality design and development work is being done to meet the business requirementsCreate and Provide Status reports on a weekly basisCandidate Qualifications:Must have at least 10-15 years of telecom Wireline/Cable solutions management experience.Must have good understanding and experience of design and delivery of Cable Wireline Activation/ProvisioningWorking understanding of DOCSIS is preferredShould have experience working with Technical Development teams and Business Stakeholders in the pastShould have technical solution design experience – must have created deliverables like Architecture Blueprints, HLD, LLD etcExcellent Communication and Status Reporting SkillsMust be based out of Denver.
